resources.string: Accomplished, passionate mobile developer with extensive mobile development experience. Seeking to leverage and advance my technical expertise to develop outstanding apps in the role of Mobile Software Engineer.

• Principal Android / iOS developer and experienced Technical Lead
 • Extensive experience delivering complex mobile apps and supporting all phases of the software development life cycle
 • Strong technical knowledge of mobile development technologies and understanding of object-oriented (OO) principles, MVC and MVVM
 • Full Stack Engineer with experience developing .Net backends
 • Proactive learner with several industry-valued certifications
 • Team-oriented mindset with ability to lead, manage, meet deadlines and deliver quality products
 • Positive, self-motivated attitude and attention to detail
 • Trained in Agile Software Development methodology
 • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
 • Advanced degrees: BS in Computer Science, Masters in Technology Management.
Principal Android / iOS Developer, Technical Lead
Principal developer leading Android and iOS team in the development of a secure Enterprise messaging and VOIP mobile application. Developed secure vehicle-to-vehicle communication prototypes.
Android Team Lead / Senior Mobile Architect
As part of the Molina Mobile Development team, designed and developed several native Android, iOS and Xamarin apps. Authored Mobile Security Guidelines for Mobile Development.
Designed and developed several mobile prototypes in native Android and iOS. Presented multiple solutions related to WiFi and hotspot security and authentication
Developed test tools to connect WiMAX 4G devices to the network; tested and developed OMA clients for device provisioning.
Responsible for managing the Ringtone and Ringback Tone purchase applications for Verizon Wireless, Inc. which generated a yearly revenue of 110 and 153 million dollars in 2009.

In the role of PDM Consultant and Architect, implemented TeamCenter Product Data Management software at several Fortune 500 Companies such as Mack Trucks, Gillette, Renault, Otis elevators and Kodak. Worked at locations in the US and Paris, France.
Google’s Android Associate certification, which demonstrates the type of skill that an entry-level Android Developer should have as they begin their career.
ATC’s Android developer certification demonstrates the type of skill that an entry-level Android Developer should have.
6-month program to learn iOS Development and Swift from the ground up.
Oracle’s exam to demonstrate a solid understanding of the Java Programming language.
Python Institute certificate for basic Python programming and general object-oriented programming concepts.
CompTIA Security+ is a certification to validate foundational, vendor-neutral IT security knowledge and skills.
Enterprise mobile application for secure messaging and VOIP (Android and iOS).

Intended for Molina Healthcare members to search for providers, view coverage information, pay bills, manage their account, view their health information (medications, allergies, service history) and access nurse and provider information. English and Spanish language implementation.
Proof-Of-Concept shuttle tracking app using Android Fused Location Provider. Allowed Molina Healthcare members to view shuttle schedule , location and receive notifications when the shuttle is near.
Intended for Molina Healthcare employees to search for colleagues, view contact information, navigate the corporate hierarchy, find buildings and address information and find open conference rooms.
Intended for Molina Healthcare managers to manage system and software access for their subordinates from their mobile phone.
Intended for Molina Healthcare executives to view the IT Strategic plan on their tablet or mobile phone.
Intended for medical providers to look up ICD-9 or ICD-10 codes for disease and health conditions and access a mapping between them.
V2V Secure Messaging Library (Native Android, C, C++)
Secure Messaging library for secure vehicle-to-vehicle communication In native Android layer implementation.
Android app written in Kotlin to showcase a mobile developer\'s portfolio.
Proof-Of-Concept app for Time Warner RF engineers to view WiFi signal propagation on a map.
Blog tutorial sample app for using Firebase Database.
Blog tutorial sample app for using Firebase Storage.
Blog tutorial sample app for storing passwords securely.
Blog tutorial sample app for storing preferences securely.

Intended for Molina Pathways Providers to review member information, fill out different types of medical forms and store the information either offline on the device or sync it up to a server. The form structure downloaded from the server and dynamically rendered.
Molina mCare Case Worker App (iOS, Objective-C, JQuery Mobile)

Intended for Molina Healthcare nurses and care team members to view member form information on iPad devices, update form information in offline mode and sync the forms to Molina servers and state Medicaid/Medicare systems.
Implements the SpaceX and Flickr APIs in iOS Swift to retrieve and display information about the SpaceX project.
iOS Swift app to select tourist destinations from a map and retrieve associated photos using the Flickr API.
iOS Swift app to create Memes and share and save them using the iOS Share interface.
Sample app for a blog post tutorial about how to implement the Flickr API in iOS Swift.
